item.title: dionysus-example
item.description: Goals available for this plugin: 2 goals Goal Description dionysus-example:help Display help information on dionysus-example-maven-plugin. Call mvn dionysus-example:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details. dionysus-example:helper Helper mojo. Usage You should specify the version in your project’s plugin configuration: <project> <build> <!-- plugin management --> <pluginMangement> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.sonatype.dionysus</groupId> <artifactId>dionysus-example-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>1-SNAPSHOT</version> </plugin> </plugins> </pluginMangement> <!-- plugin execution --> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.

item.title: dionysus-example:help
item.description: Display help information on dionysus-example-maven-plugin. Call mvn dionysus-example:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details. Full name org.sonatype.dionysus:dionysus-example-maven-plugin:1-SNAPSHOT:help Requires Project false Requires Online false Requires Direct Invocation false Thread-safe true Parameters 4 parameters Name Type Since Description detail boolean If true, display all settable properties for each goal. goal java.lang.String The name of the goal for which to show help.

Another thingy. skip boolean ??? Skip execution. anotherThingy Another thingy. Type java.lang.String Since ??? Required true Default Value foo skip Skip execution.
